name.value: FHIR Connectathon 17 - Terminology Services - Translate - NOT OK - POST - Code - JSON

description.value: ConceptMap $translate tests against known and unknown FHIR code systems where the expected outcome is a failure response with a returned OperationOutcome. All $translate operations are performed using the FHIR Operation Framework HTTP POST method with Parameters of code, system, source and target.
ConceptMap create, read and translate operations

ConceptMap $translate operation test for an invalid code using HTTP POST with code, system, source and target parameters; http://hl7.org/fhir/address-use|xxx, target http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/v3-AddressUse. Expected response is 4xx/5xx with an OperationOutcome payload containing at least one error issue.
Test ConceptMap $translate operation for an invalid code.
Confirm that the returned HTTP status is 4xx/5xx.
Confirm that the returned format is JSON.
Confirm that the returned resource type is OperationOutcome.
Confirm that the returned OperationOutcome resource type conforms the base FHIR specification.
Confirm that the returned OperationOutcome resource contains at least one error or fatal issue.

ConceptMap $translate operation test for an invalid code and source system using HTTP POST with code, system, source and target parameters; http://hl7.org/fhir/address-useX|old, target http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/v3-AddressUse. Expected response is 4xx/5xx with an OperationOutcome payload containing at least one error issue.
